verses.roman:
gaura-līlāmṛta-sindhu--apāra agādha
ke karite pāre tāhāṅ avagāha-sādha

synonyms: gaura-līlāmṛta-sindhu—the ocean of the pastimes of Lord Caitanya; apāra—immeasurable; agādha—unfathomable; ke—who; karite—to do; pāre—is able; tāhāṅ—in that ocean; avagāha—taking a dip; sādha—execution.
translation: The ocean of the pastimes of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu is immeasurable and unfathomable. Who can take the courage to measure that great ocean?
